Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Initial project structure with clustering and semi-supervised learning

- Add project skeleton with src/etl, src/models, and notebooks directories
- Implement PDF downloader module for automated PDF acquisition
- Create data extraction module using OpenAI API
- Implement ClusteringAnalyzer with K-Means, Agglomerative, and DBSCAN algorithms
- Add SemiSupervisedLearner with Label Propagation and Self-Training
- Create comprehensive Jupyter notebook for Google Colab
- Generate sample financial data for cooperatives
- Include full documentation and README with setup instructions
- Add requirements.txt with all dependencies

Project ready for clustering analysis and semi-supervised learning on Ecuador''s cooperatives Segment 1 financial data.

EOF
)")
